articles.title: Netflix becomes frontrunner in bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery, sources say - CNN
articles.description: Netflix’s most recent offer, submitted on Thursday, valued the Warner Bros. studio, HBO Max streaming service and related parts of the company at around $28 per share, sources said.

articles.title: Putin visits India amid Ukraine peace push: What’s on the agenda? - Al Jazeera
articles.description: President Putin visits India as Russia faces pressure to end war in Ukraine, looking to boost bilateral trade deals.

articles.title: CeeDee Lamb leaves with concussion as Cowboys cut deficit to 27-16 - NBC Sports
articles.description: The Cowboys wide receiver was injured on an incompletion in the end zone in the third quarter.

articles.title: Navy deployment marred by friendly fire, lost jets, collision at sea - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Truman aircraft carrier group conducted airstrikes for 52 days straight. Investigators found that not all of its ships or crews were ready for such intensity.

articles.title: Matt Reeves Defends Paul Dano After Quentin Tarantino Calls Him “Weak Sauce” - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Reeves, who directed Dano in 'The Batman,' calls him "an incredible actor, and an incredible person."

articles.title: Gov. Walz denounces Trump for calling Minnesota’s Somali community ‘garbage’ - AP News
articles.description: Democratic Governor Tim Walz has denounced former President Donald Trump for his comments about Minnesota’s Somali community. Trump has called the community “garbage” and labeled the state a “hellhole.” Walz said Thursday these remarks slandered all Minnesota…

articles.title: Exclusive: Survivors clinging to capsized boat didn’t radio for backup, admiral overseeing double-tap strike tells lawmakers - CNN
articles.description: The two men killed as they floated holding onto their capsized boat in a secondary strike against a suspected drug vessel in early September did not appear to have radio or other communications devices, the top military official overseeing the strike told law…

articles.title: Thursday Night Football: How to Watch Cowboys vs. Lions Tonight for Free - CNET
articles.description: Find out how to watch or stream tonight's game and the rest of the Week 14 slate no matter where you live.

articles.title: Grand jury rejects DOJ's attempt to revive fraud case against New York AG Letitia James: Sources - ABC News
Cervical cancer screening guidelines just changed. Here’s what it means. - The Washington Post
articles.description: The American Cancer Society now says a self-collected vaginal swab to test for HPV, which causes nearly all cervical cancer cases, is acceptable for screening.

articles.title: Brian Walshe murder trial: Man who had affair with Walshe's wife testifies - ABC News
Hong Kong fire arrests: Why questions are getting people detained - BBC
articles.description: Miles Kwan was detained after he launched a petition demanding answers from Hong Kong authorities.

articles.title: Mike Johnson scrambles to pass Pentagon bill as GOP ranks seethe - Politico
articles.description: The must-pass legislation will test Johnson’s ability to command and cajole his conference with must-pass legislation at stake.

articles.title: Congress told there needs to be “consequences” for NASA delays amid China’s rise - Ars Technica
articles.description: “The Artemis III mission and those beyond should be canceled.”…

articles.title: How the Coaching Carousel Is Creating Awkward Distractions During Championship Week - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The American Conference features programs entering title games which are led by coaches already hired elsewhere, creating unprecedented, high-stakes tension.

articles.title: Apple’s executive shake-up continues with departures of general counsel and policy head - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple loses two more top senior executives with exits of longtime general counsel Kate Adams and environmental VP Lisa Jackson. Meta’s Jennifer Newstead is set to join as new general counsel in 2026.

articles.title: Appeals court temporarily lets DC deployment of National Guard continue - The Hill
articles.description: A federal appeals court panel on Thursday temporarily lifted a judge’s order blocking President Trump’s deployment of National Guard troops to Washington, D.C.  The three judges on the U.S. Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted the Tru…

articles.title: Scientists discover one of our universe's largest spinning structures — a 50-million-light-year-long cosmic thread - Space
articles.description: The filament of matter stretches 50 million light-years, and contains a row of galaxies 5.5 million light-years long that are rotating in sync with the filament.

articles.title: CDC advisers delay planned vote on hepatitis B vaccine for infants : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: After a contentious discussion, the vaccine advisory group pushed the vote to Friday to give members time to study the language of proposed changes longstanding policy on the shots.
